description:
In migration 200 this patch https://review.openstack.org/#/c/33127/19, was add unique constraint with bad name. Unfortunately this will work in sqlite and won't work in mysql and psql.

So this code won't work properly in production databases.
title: Wrong unique key name in 200 migration

comments.content: In migration 200 this patch https://review.openstack.org/#/c/33127/19, was add unique constraint with bad name. Unfortunately this will work in sqlite and won't work in mysql and psql.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~boris-42

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/37251
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This fix got merged before the final Havana release, but the magic that should have closed the bug failed.  (I think because of a stray period after the bug number.)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dripton
